name: zaahah
overview:
Zaahah is a Game Changer for Newspapers & Online Media. At no cost, newspapers and other online media can leverage the social value of content into interest-based communities. Newspaper sections and current events are transformed into social communities, where readers can comment, chat and share content. Newspapers will see increased engagement, page views and revenue. Furthermore, Zaahah’s media partners can offer a unique solution to small and mid-sized businesses, generating a consistent revenue stream.

Zaahah is a Smart Choice for Businesses & Large Groups or Student Associations.

  • Zaahah’s collaborative communities support internal & external teams,
  • Zaahah’s cloud storage combines offline data and online research,
  • Zaahah’s patent pending matching:
    • Reduces redundant effort & encourage collaboration,
    • Instantly identifies consumers searching for your products or competitors’ products.

The Zaahah toolbar for Internet Explorer and Firefox instantly connects users with the same interest on approximately 500 websites, this includes search, social, ecommerce, over 100 online newspapers and magazines and 350 university libraries. This is powerful and new. For example, a user searching Google can instantly connect with a user researching the same topic on Twitter.

To learn more about Zaahah, please email info@zaahah.me.
